title: How do I save a web page?
answer:
Open a web page and touch Menu. From the displayed option menu, choose Save for offline read. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111722)

 You can touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111723)>Bookmarks>Save pages to view Offline save web page. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111724)
